messages.title: Four steps to a fairer Britain

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. Pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn - cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and abolish university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investments in public transport, renewable energy, and energy efficiency homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for you from the politicians
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

issues.governance: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.
issues.health: The Lib Dems will take action to protect frontline NHS services.

housing.content: Investments in public transport, renewable energy, and energy efficiency homes.

endorsements.endorsement: Gail with Lib Dem Leader Nick Clegg during his recent visit to our area.

images.caption: Gail with Lib Dem Leader Nick Clegg during his recent visit to our area.

leaflet.additionalNotes: We're the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.
